row._Details:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="ISO-8859-1"?><!DOCTYPE Change-Log [ <!ELEMENT Change-Log ( #PCDATA ) >
<!ELEMENT Content ( #PCDATA | Change-Log | Externe_Links | Restart-Info )* > <!ATTLIST Content Ersteller CDATA "null" > <!ATTLIST Content Erstellungsdatum CDATA "null" >
<!ELEMENT Externe_Links ( #PCDATA ) >
<!ELEMENT Restart-Info ( #PCDATA ) > <!ATTLIST Restart-Info Priorität ( 0 | 1 | 2 | 3 ) "0" > <!ATTLIST Restart-Info Restart-erlaubt ( ja | nein ) "ja" >
]> <Content Ersteller="BLxxxxx/EXxxxxx" Erstellungsdatum="xx.xx.xxxx">Freier Dokumentationstext
<Change-Log>Datum Wer Warum
xx.xx.xxxx BLxxxxx Änderungsgrund EXxxxxx </Change-Log> <Externe_Links>ACHTUNG: die Links dürfen keine Leerzeichen enthalten!!!! z.B. file:c:\temp\bla.txt http://www.aaa.com ---------------------------------------------------------
</Externe_Links> <Restart-Info Priorität="2" Restart-erlaubt="ja">Priorität=0: unternehmenskritisch, muss sofort behoben werden (z.B. monetäre Schäden) Priorität=1: kritisch, es muss sofort zu Beginn der Arbeitszeit von System Management mit der Fehlerbehebung oder Workaround begonnen werden (z.B. Fehlinformationen an Kunden) Priorität=2: mittlere Auswirkungen, mit der Fehlerbehebung oder Workaround muss am gleichen Tag begonnen werden Priorität=3: geringe Auswirkungen (muss innerhalb einer Woche behoben werden) </Restart-Info>
</Content>

row.process: :SET &DB_TABLE# = "TNBLISTE_FI_SAP" :SET &ORAUSER# = "bbsbat" :SET &ORADB# = "DLLW1&IDT#" :SET &CRTLFILE# = "SAP_FI_BBS_INKA.ctl" :SET &PARFILE# = "SAP_FI_BBS_INKA.par" :SET &LOADERFILE# = "SAP_FI_BBS_INKA.dat" :RSET &LOGFILE# = "SAP_FI_BBS_INKA.log" :RSET &BADFILE# = "SAP_FI_BBS_INKA.bad" :SET &PROGRAM# = "sqlldr" :SET &OPTIONS# = "parfile=&PARFILE# control=&CRTLFILE# data=&LOADERFILE# bad=&LOGDIR#/&BADFILE# log=&LOGDIR#/&LOGFILE#" ! ------------------------------------------------------------ :INC JOBI.GETPW_DBTOOLS ! ------------------------------------------------------------ :INC JOBI.DBTOOLS_CREATEFOLDER ! ---------------------- ! Transfer &LOADERFILE#: ! ---------------------- :SET &SRC_HOST# = "HG.RH6_BATCH" :SET &FT_SRC_FILE# = "&WORKDIR#/&LOADERFILE#" :SET &FT_DST_FILE# = "&RUNDIR#/&LOADERFILE#" ! ---------------------------------------- :INC JOBI.DBTOOLS_FILEREC "MODUS" = "MOVE" ! ---------------------------------------- dos2unix &FT_DST_FILE# ! ------------------------------------- ! Erstellung &RUNDIR#/&CRTLFILE#: ! ------------------------------------- cat << __EOF__ | tee &RUNDIR#/&CRTLFILE# Load DATA INTO TABLE &DB_TABLE# REPLACE FIELDS TERMINATED BY ';' TRAILING NULLCOLS ( BUCH_PER ,MANDANT ,VTR_NR ,WERT_SAP ,HB_KONTO ,KNZ_MANUELL ) __EOF__ ! ------------------------------------- ! Erstellung &RUNDIR#/&PARFILE# ! ------------------------------------- cat << __EOF__ > &RUNDIR#/&PARFILE# userid=&ORAUSER#/$ORA_PASSWD@&ORADB# rows=100000 errors=0 direct=false __EOF__ ! ----------------------- ! Start der Verarbeitung: ! ----------------------- :INC JOBI.DBTOOLS_RUNSQLLDR

row.post_process: :INC JOBI.SHELL_POST ! ----------------- ! Transfer Logfile: ! ----------------- :SET &DST_HOST# = "HG.RH6_BATCH" :SET &FT_SRC_FILE# = "&LOGDIR#/&LOGFILE#" :SET &FT_DST_FILE# = "&LOGDIR#/&LOGFILE#" ! --------------------------------------- :INC JOBI.DBTOOLS_FILESEND "MODUS" = "MOVE" ! ----------------- ! Transfer Badfile: ! ----------------- :SET &DST_HOST# = "HG.RH6_BATCH" :SET &FT_SRC_FILE# = "&LOGDIR#/&BADFILE#" :SET &FT_DST_FILE# = "&LOGDIR#/&BADFILE#" ! --------------------------------------- :INC JOBI.DBTOOLS_FILESEND "MODUS" = "MOVE"
